00003 CvGrowMat::CvGrowMat(int maxlines, int maxcols, int type)
00004 {
00005         mat = cvCreateMat(maxlines, maxcols, type);
00006         cvSetZero(mat);
00007         cvGetSubRect(mat, this, cvRect(0,0,maxcols,maxlines));

00015 void CvGrowMat::resize(int lines, int cols)
00016 {
00017         if (lines <= mat->rows && cols <= mat->cols) {
00018                 cvGetSubRect(mat, this, cvRect(0,0,cols,lines));
00019                 //this->rows = lines;
00020                 //this->cols = cols;
00021         } else {
00022                 int nl = (lines > mat->rows ? lines*2 : mat->rows);
00023                 int nc = (cols > mat->cols ? cols*2 : mat->cols);
00024                 CvMat *nm = cvCreateMat(nl, nc, mat->type);
00025                 cvSetZero(nm);
00026                 if (this->rows && this->cols) {
00027                         CvMat sub;
00028                         cvGetSubRect(nm, &sub, cvRect(0,0,this->cols, this->rows));
00029                         cvCopy(this, &sub);
00030                         cvGetSubRect(nm, this, cvRect(0,0,cols, lines));
00031                 } else {
00032                         cvGetSubRect(nm, this, cvRect(0,0,mat->cols, mat->rows));
00033                         this->rows = lines;
00034                         this->cols = cols;
00035                 }
00036                 cvReleaseMat(&mat);
00037                 mat = nm;
00038         }
00039 }
